column1: On Thursday the Stormont executive meets to review the coronavirus restrictions for Northern Ireland amid speculation that dates for reopening will be provided.Our political reporter Jayne McCormack and business reporter Richard Morgan will be on hand to answer your questions about what happens next.If you have any questions
column2: send them in using the form below.Don't forget to join us at 19:00 BST on Thursday on the BBC News NI website
column3: the BBC iPlayer and the BBC News NI Facebook page.
